title: Introducing new Fitbit Alta™
description: Motivation is your best accessory with new Fitbit® Alta™— a slim, sleek fitness wristband that’s as versatile as your personal style. Stay motivated with a suite of new activity features and smart notifications right on your wrist, and find the right style for every occasion with interchangeable accessories. Wear fitness your way with Fitbit Alta

asset.title: Introducing new Fitbit Alta™
asset.description: Motivation is your best accessory with new Fitbit® Alta™— a slim, sleek fitness wristband that’s as versatile as your personal style. Stay motivated with a suite of new activity features and smart notifications right on your wrist, and find the right style for every occasion with interchangeable accessories. Wear fitness your way with Fitbit Alta
asset.author: Fitbit

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

We're fitness your way with Fitbit Alta. A slim fitness wristband that automatically tracks  everything. From sleep to running out the door to going on a morning run so you can find the motivation you need to make the most of your routine. Stay in touch with call, text, and calendar notifications. And stay on track with friendly reminders to move. Smart track automatically records your workouts because when you put in the effort you deserve the credit and every step counts when you're working toward a goal. Compete with your friends on the leader board and automatically sync your stats to your smart phone. Alta let's you switch up your style with premium accessory bands so no matter what you're wearing or where you'e going, you can transform your life as much as your look. Motivation is you're best accessory; wear it with Fitbit Alta
